text:
Face Transplant Recipient Hails Staggering Results Of Procedure 754 396 in People Andy-Sandness Face-transplant-recipient-hails-staggering-results-of-procedure Face-transplant Andy tried to end his life by shooting himself back in the head in 2006, but he failed. He'd been waiting for this day, and when his doctor handed him the mirror... He had a new face, a face that belonged to another man. He is happy! His father, brother, his family was right there with him joined by several doctors and nurses at the Mayo Clinic. They watched him as he studied his swollen features. He still needed a speech therapy to help him speak quickly. He scribbled mere four words in a spiral notebook showing his gratitude: "Far exceeded my expectations." All his hopes got answered by Mardini, a plastic surgeon whose speciality is facial reconstruction. His medical journey came to an end after 10 long years. It was difficult to get his way back. His world was shrunk. He was tired of hiding his truth from people. When they asked, he used to tell them it was a hunting accident. The surgery took 56 hours, taking breaks. 
Restless but happy. Andy cannot wait to have a beautiful life now! Loved this? Spread it out then
